question.ask: Questions 1~2  Your deskmate has been absent from class for two days. So you call him and ask him two questions to show your concern.

std.value: What happened to you? Do you meet any trouble?
std.ai: What happened to you? Do you meet any trouble?

std.value: Is there anything I can do for you? How is everything going?
std.ai: Is there anything I can do for you? How is everything going?

std.value: What’s wrong with you? Do you encounter any difficulties?
std.ai: What’s wrong with you? Do you encounter any difficulties?

question.keywords: What happened Do meet trouble|Is there anything do How everything going|What’s wrong Do encounter difficulties

question.ask: Questions 3~4  Your cousin is going to graduate from university. You ask him two questions about his plan.

std.value: How would you like to celebrate your graduation? Have you found a job?
std.ai: How would you like to celebrate your graduation? Have you found a job?

std.value: What kind of work do you want to do after graduation? Will you feel reluctant to leave the campus?
std.ai: What kind of work do you want to do after graduation? Will you feel reluctant to leave the campus?

std.value: How would you like to celebrate your graduation? Will your parents come to attend your graduation ceremony?
std.ai: How would you like to celebrate your graduation? Will your parents come to attend your graduation ceremony?

question.keywords: How celebrate graduation Have found job|What kind work want graduation Will feel reluctant leave campus|How celebrate graduation Will parents come attend graduation ceremony
